text: “niyata vasayenma allah dupteki; apima dhanavatunya” yayi kavurun pævasuvehuda, ovunge vadana niyata vasayenma savan dunneya. (mese) ovun pævasimada, asadharanaye nabivarunva ovun ghatanaya kirimada, niyata vasayenma api satahan karaminma sitinnemu. (ebævin paralovadi ovunta) “davalana danduvama oba (podiyak) vinda balanu” yayi api kiyannemu
